data.description:
Dust: Virtual Combat collects all VR playstyles into one virtual world where players can gather and compete as their favorite VR characters. Built on top of a custom networking system, Dust is the only multiplayer VR game designed from the ground up to be fun, fair, and fluid even when the most intense players are battling it out from opposite sides of the planet. 

Each playable class is a mix of unique VR locomotion and combat styles players will recognize from across the VR world:

- Gorilla Arm locomotion
- Joystick locomotion
- Arms-as-wings Flying locomotion
- Rocket-thruster-hands Flying locomotion
- Climbing locomotion
- Grapple-swinging locomotion
- and more...

Dust is currently in early alpha and changes often, but it is free-to-play and always will be.

changelog.change_log:
Hotfix to improve FPS via occlusion culling

Fix for Assassin Smoke Grenade

Arena doors can be found throughout The Hub now!

Jukebox volume can be adjusted via "Music" in Audio settings

Fixed controller orientation for OculusLink SteamVR users

Assassin has experimental smokebomb on B/Y

Gamemode should last longer and is now single capture point

Dueling starts faster and dueling platform has been updated

PCVR players can activate experimental Streamer Camera

Training Grounds has new floating platforms for Grappler

New arena Cargo Ship added to Quickmatch
Fixed game mode in all arenas (Games no longer always result in a Tie)
Added Wrist UI for HP and Team Scores
PvP disables safezones in Hub
